isis.stitle: TSI 97-12-21 - High Altitude Glow Plug Deactivation on International® T 444E Engines

subjectgroup.subject: High Altitude Glow Plug Deactivation on International® T 444E Engines

geninfo.para: The T 444E engine normally does not energize the glow plugs during hot starts. However, it senses reduced atmospheric pressure at high altitude and will energize the glow plugs during hot starts.

To improve the reliability of the glow plug relay used on the T 444E engines in high altitude stop/restart applications, a service package ( P/N 1831142C91) is released to deactivate the glow plug relay when coolant temperature in the cylinder head is above 46.1°C (115°F).

The service package includes a glow plug jumper harness (P/N 1807429C1), temperature switch (P/N 1807429C1), and installation instructions. Be sure to follow the instructions furnished with the package.
